name: Snow-stained Banquet
description:
It's a warm story. "

Girls who have received invitations to attend the banquet held by snow-stained witches collect gifts for witches along the way. Whose memory did you see on the way?

---

Game type: Exploring puzzles
Game size: 112MB
Author: Snow Crow
Number of endings: 4

To make a full ending, you cannot inherit the 1.01 archive.

The main storyline of this game is just to collect gifts. You can get a gift on each floor and you can go upstairs. You don't have to solve all the puzzles in this layer.

---

『这是个温暖人心的故事。』

收到邀请函，去参加雪染的魔女召开的宴会的少女，一路上收集着献给魔女的礼物。途中看到的记忆是谁的呢……

---

游戏类型：探索解谜类
游戏大小：112MB
作者：雪鸦
结局数：4

若要打出全结局，不可继承1.01版的存档。

本游戏的主线剧情只是收集礼物，在每一层得到礼物就可以上楼了，并不一定要解出这层里所有的谜题。
